schema.name: Healthyfied Kimchi Beef Rice
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp(s), Seeds, sesame seeds, whole, dried

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice (Job's Tears) under cold water until the water runs clear.
Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, approximately 20 minutes, then set aside.
Finely dice the red onion and capsicum green. Mince the garlic.
Heat a pan over medium heat, add the ground beef and cook until browned, about 10 minutes.
To the pan, add the diced onion, capsicum, minced garlic, sesame seeds, ginger powder, salt, pepper, and coco sugar. Cook for another 5 minutes until the vegetables are slightly softened.
Stir in the kimchi and cook for an additional 5 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
Combine the cooked beef mixture with the steamed Adlai Rice. Adjust seasoning to taste.

schema.description: This Healthyfied Kimchi Beef Rice is the perfect combination of savory, spicy, and hearty—a health-conscious take on traditional flavors. Packed with high-protein and reimagined with a high-sodium twist, this dish offers a delicious way to enjoy healthy recipes without sacrificing taste. Ideal for anyone looking to indulge in healthified recipes that are as nourishing as they are flavorful.
